Name: Spotting Spot
Step01:
Lester, who manages the stable at Lookout
Landing, told you his beige, dappled horse,
<clr:0000>Spot<clr:ffff>, ran away.

Spot is supposedly timid though, so he may
still be close by.
Complete:
You brought the beige, dappled Spot to Lester.
The <clr:0000>swift carrot<clr:ffff> he gave you in return is a
specialty crop of <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, located
in Necluda to the southeast.
